mapper.select: /* 예약 리스트 조회 - selectReserveList */ SELECT RESV_NO , RESV_DTE , USER_ID , RESV_TITLE AS title , RESV_CONTENT , RESV_ST_DTE , RESV_ST_TIME , RESV_ED_DTE , RESV_ED_TIME , RESV_PHONE_NUM , OFFICE_NO , DEL_YN , FST_INS_DTE , LST_MODIFY_DTE FROM T_RESERVE WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND USER_ID = #{userId}
